name: Salkantay 5 Days /4 Nights
description: Salkantay trekking become one of the best hiking trips in the Peruvian Andean Mountains. For the local people this mountain is consider as a sacred spirit and is the greatest mountain in the Cordillera Vilcabamba. Salkantay is the highest peak in the Vilcabamba mountain range located at 6272m-20,577ft sea level. The Salkantay trail, the mountains, valleys and the high passes have been the enjoyment of many tourists who hike this marvelous place. North of Salcantay, high above a mountain in the Urubamba river, lies the Inca complex of Machu Picchu, where you will have a long visit and a guided tour around it.
